assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7VIN35Q17 _______ குழாய் திராட்சியாதலுக்கான எடுத்துக்காட்டு.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

_______ குழாய் திராட்சியாதலுக்கான எடுத்துக்காட்டு.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

வைடால் சோதனை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1234"},{"text":"

வீல் பிலிக்ஸ் சோதனை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1235"},{"text":"

எதுவுமில்லை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1250"},{"text":"

வைடால் சோதனை மற்றும் வீல் பிலிக்ஸ் சோதனை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4322"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7VIN35Q17 _______ குழாய் திராட்சியாதலுக்கான எடுத்துக்காட்டு.","title":"7VIN35Q17 _______ குழாய் திராட்சியாதலுக்கான எடுத்துக்காட்டு.","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
